Bevel Bump Control. Smoother skin starts here—formulated to fight razor bumps and ingrown hairs without harsh, drying alcohols.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Fights Razor Bumps: Targets and helps prevent irritation after shaving.

  • Exfoliates + Renews: 10% glycolic acid gently removes dead skin cells for clearer skin.

  • Soothes + Protects: Green tea calms skin while reducing redness and irritation.

  • Alcohol-Free Formula: No drying alcohols—just effective, skin-friendly care.

A MOMENT OF CLARITY

This Bump Control After Shave helps exfoliates to help reduce bumps and ingrown hairs for smoother skin.

FOR BEST USE

Use after shaving or any time in between. Massage a small amount over clean face and neck. Allow to dry. Finish with Bevel Face Gel.
Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

Full Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 20, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Dihydromyricetin, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract.
